# go-db-models

根据配置参数自动创建所有数据表的struct结构，每个结构独立为一个文件。

## INSTALL

```sh
go get github.com/ibbd-dev/go-db-models
```

## USAGE

```sh
# 生成struct
go-db-models -o host -d database -u username -p password -n packageName

# 帮助
go-db-models -h
```

生成的结构文件如下：

```go
// DON'T EDIT *** generated by go-db-models *** DON'T EDIT //
package packageName

import "database/sql"
import "time"

// 对应数据表：dict_channel
type DictChannelTable struct {
	Id                 uint32         `name:"id"`
	Name               string         `name:"name"`
	Status             uint8          `name:"status"`
	PremiumRate        float64        `name:"premium_rate"`
	PremiumMsg         string         `name:"premium_msg"`
	Remark             sql.NullString `name:"remark"`
	CreatedAt          time.Time      `name:"created_at"`
	UpdatedAt          time.Time      `name:"updated_at"`
}
```
